pos_mean_info_list.mean: 有说服力的；劝诱的，劝说的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指用感情说服某人去做某事。如：I persuaded him to go back to work. (我说服他回去工作了。)
表建议，规劝某人应该做某事或如何做。如：He advised me to put my money in the bank. (他劝我把钱存入银行。)
指向某人陈述事实，运用推理或逻辑证明使某人信服。如：We convinced Smith to go by train rather than plane. (我们说服了史密斯乘火车而不乘飞机前往。)
指用好话善意或耐心劝诱、哄骗某人做某事。
语气强，指不断地热情地规劝诱导。
普通用词，指通过劝说、感情交流等而使对方做劝说者所希望的事。
指用讲道理来使某人做某事。
较正式用词，指对一些较重大事情所提出的劝告。有时也用于非正式场合，但仍强调严肃的一面。
指凭行动、事实或言语使他人从思想感情上信服。

bilingual.source: Act out the conversation to persuade a customer to buy a new mixed fruit drink.
bilingual.target: 表演对话以说服顾客购买新的混合果汁饮料。

bilingual.source: How would you try to persuade adults to let you do something new and difficult, such as sail a dinghy on your own?
bilingual.target: 你会如何说服成年人让你做一些新的和困难的事情，比如独自驾驶小帆船？

bilingual.source: My name is Jacintha Dolores, and I am here today to try to persuade you to let us have more time in school for sporting activities.
bilingual.target: 我叫贾辛塔·多洛雷斯，今天我来这里是想说服您让我们在学校有更多的时间进行体育活动。

bilingual.source: She used sweet words to persuade him.
bilingual.target: 她用甜言蜜语说服了他。

bilingual.source: She spoke with the intent to persuade him.
bilingual.target: 她说话的意图是说服他。

bilingual.source: Can you persuade him to join our team?
bilingual.target: 你能说服他加入我们的团队吗？

bilingual.source: I managed to persuade him to change his mind.
bilingual.target: 我设法说服他改变主意。

bilingual.source: He tried to persuade her to go to the party.
bilingual.target: 他试图说服她去参加聚会。

bilingual.source: She tried to persuade him to attend the meeting.
bilingual.target: 她试图说服他参加会议。

list.abstract: persuade，有说服，劝服的意思。有及物动词和非及物动词两种。

yingyinNormal.en: How'd you persuade him to keep your secret?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是怎么说服他让他保住秘密的？

yingyinNormal.en: I wish we could persuade you to help us stem the tide of change.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我希望我们能说服你抵御改变。

yingyinNormal.en: That's what I said, but she seems to think she can persuade him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也是这么说的，可她似乎认为她能说服他。

yingyinNormal.en: What if I say no? I'll persuade you. And what if the other guy says no?
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我拒绝呢？我会说服你的。如果我身体里的另一个我拒绝呢？

yingyinNormal.en: And if they won't surrender? Then we will need a compelling voice to persuade them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果他们不投降怎么办？那我们就需要有一个强有力的声音来说服他们。

yingyinNormal.en: Then I'll report back. And we'll make a decision together. But I will try to persuade you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 回来再向您报告 。然后我们一起做决定。但我会尽力说服您的。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't be. He wanted us to get married. Our week in sin was just part of his plan to persuade me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不必，他是想跟我结婚的，我们同居一周是他说服我的策略。

yingyinNormal.en: But they don't want us to have the bone, so I'm going over there to try to persuade them to give us the bone. It's a whole big bone thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但他们不想给我们骨头，因此派我去说服他们给我们骨头，都是骨头的事。

yingyinNormal.en: Soft power, a term I'm sure you're all familiar with at this point coined by Rhodes Scholar and Oxford alumnus Joseph Nye is defined as the ability to attract and persuade.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我相信今天你们对软实力这个词都很熟悉了，这个词是由罗氏奖学金获得者，牛津校友，约瑟夫·奈发明的，含义是，吸引和说服的能力。

yingyinNormal.en: The last thing I want is to be slammed for giving additional money to a brutal dictator from USAID just to persuade him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我最不需要的就是因为从国际开发署拨款给一个我想讨好的残忍独裁者而遭到抨击。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_usage.usage: persuade既可作及物动词，又可作不及物动词。作及物动词时，其后通常接表示人的名词或者代词，也常用于persuade sb. to do sth.的结构中，如：persuade him to write a letter

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 说服；劝服；被说服；被说服相信；信念；信仰；劝诱；说理；教派；类别
adj. 有说服力的；能说服人的；善于说服人的

word_family.mean: v. 说服；劝服；敦促；使相信；使信服；驱使

sense_info_list.en: cause someone to do something through reasoning or argument

examination_example.sentence: They found the opposite when a text is easier to read, then people are more <highlight>persuaded</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们发现，相反，当文本更容易阅读时，人们更容易被说服。

examination_example.sentence: Many dairy farmers were <highlight>persuaded</highlight> to switch to grass-fed when they saw its advantage in terms of profits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当许多奶农看到利润方面的好处时，被劝说改用草饲。

examination_example.sentence: That won't stop inventors from dreaming up new ways to fly and trying to <highlight>persuade</highlight> investors to back their sometimes outrageous schemes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这不会阻止发明家们追求新飞行方式的梦想，他们还试图说服投资者支持那些有时看起来很离谱的计划。

examination_example.sentence: The simplest thing cannot be made clear to the most intelligent man if he is firmly <highlight>persuaded</highlight> that he knows already.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果一个最聪明的人坚信他已经知道了，那么最简单的事情对他来说也是不清楚的。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 劝说者；说服者；制服手段
adj. 有说服力的；能说服人的；善于说服人的

word_family.mean: v. 说服；劝服；敦促；使相信；使信服；驱使

sense_info_list.en: cause someone to do something through reasoning or argument

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Persuading</highlight> prospective fathers to consider a change in their career.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 说服准爸爸们考虑改变职业生涯。

examination_example.sentence: Sometimes Jody feels that she succeeds in <highlight>persuading</highlight> some students to stop dieting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有时，乔迪觉得她成功地说服了一些学生去停止节食。

word_usage.usage: persuade sb. to do sth.表示说服了某人做某事；若表示试图说服某人做某事而未涉及结果，则用try/want to persuade sb. to do sth.或advise sb. to do sth.。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: cause someone to do something through reasoning or argument

examination_example.sentence: Therefore, instead of resisting (抵制) fast food restaurants, a better idea may be to <highlight>persuade</highlight> (说服) them to change their menu!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，与其抵制快餐店，不如说服他们改变菜单！
